Traits.Name: Shadowform
Traits.Content: While in dim light or darkness, the Day of the Shadows can become incorporeal, making it immune to all damage from non-magical attacks.

Traits.Name: Dreadful Presence
Traits.Content: Creatures that start their turn within 30 feet of the Day of the Shadows must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If the Day of the Shadows fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Day of the Shadows makes two Shadow Claw attacks and one Devouring Darkness attack.

Actions.Name: Shadow Claw
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +15 to hit, dealing 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or have its speed reduced by half until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Devouring Darkness
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +15 to hit, dealing 31 (5d10 + 3) necrotic damage. The creature must make a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn due to the overwhelming darkness.

Actions.Name: Umbral Burst
Actions.Content: Area of effect action (30-foot radius sphere centered on the Day of the Shadows). Each creature within range must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 60 (11d10) necrotic damage, or half as much on a successful save. Any creature that fails the save is also enveloped in shadows, imposing disadvantage on its attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

LegendaryActions.Name: Shadow Shift (Costs 1 Action)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Day of the Shadows can shift to a position within 30 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. This action may also free it from grapples or restraints, allowing it to re-position and attack more effectively on its next turn.

LegendaryActions.Name: Unsettling Whispers (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Day of the Shadows targets one creature within 120 feet, forcing it to make a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is incapacitated until the end of its next turn as haunting whispers flood its mind, sapping its will to fight.

LegendaryActions.Name: Shroud of Despair (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Day of the Shadows conjures a thick cloud of darkness in a 20-foot radius around it. Each creature that starts its turn in this area must make a DC 22 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, they take 50 (9d10) necrotic damage, and their visions are clouded, giving them disadvantage on saving throws until the end of their next turn.
